metadata.title: CVE-2022-3707 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A double-free memory flaw was found in the Linux kernel. The Intel GVT-ggraphics driver triggers VGA card system resource overload, causing a failin the intel_gvt_dma_map_guest_page function. This issue could allow alocal user to crash the system.
